column5: what was that???LOL we stole that game too and Leafs got OWNED!
at least the soo greyhounds are doing well!

Not much of an argument ender when it is incorrect. You, or your parents, may not have had a colour TV then, but the cup was filmed in colour. Some regular season games were however still filmed in B & W in the early 1970's.  Please, if you are going to engage in lame trash talk at least stick to the truth. Carry on.
rangers all the way no need to say anything else
Habs stole that game....suck it LEAFS! and I hope you guys enjoy Komi gettin 8 penalties LOL what a loser

Well Price stole the show when it comes right down to it.. not his team... and the Leaf's did their usual final 5 minute choke routine ! Ice the puck 3 times in 12 seconds..     ... Looks like another year of the same old from them...

You should seek therapy my friend. Anyone that uses the word suck and loser as often as you do has a serious problem. Your parents must have raised you right by leaving you alone with no friends.   :lol:

I agree 100% It was only when Komi was in the Box that the Canadians actually tried to shoot on net, other wise they were getting rid of the puck afraid of getting hurt.  But I do like that North American line that the Canadians finally put togeather.  Its nice seeing them at least making an attempt to get near the crease.  We are Talking Gomez, Gionta and Cammalleri.  I like Torontos game though, nice to see some toughness now.

Just before the implosion I was thinking that if only they could have swapped goaltenders (Price for Toskala) the score would have been something like 5-1. Price was very solid. Toskala was Toskala. He had some good moments, but not enuf of them.  Hopefully K. will stifle his enthusiasm for games against other teams. If it had started after the Habs started running Toskala I might have assumed it was a message being sent, albeit rather clumsily, but it just seemed to be the way he was gonna play that game. Hopefully it was because he felt he had something extra to prove to his old buddies, and not a sign of how it's gonna be all year.  JF

Well after last night my two perdictions for the finals were embarresed.  Thank god its only the first night.  But what a first night it was...i think we will see some teams this year play as if they have something to prove....Washington being one of them...they played like they were obsessed...Ovie...wow....against my Bruins at that.  Luongo looked ....err...human...he played weak, however the flames played a sutter like style of hockey which was nice to see...as fer the Leafs and Habs....didnt watch...dont care....but the Avs over the Sharks in convincing style...impressive...if the sharks keep that up...i think you will be very happy witht the way the year will turn out Doc...except for your sens finishing just out of the playoffs!  hahaha

Jonh,  don't think it was something he had to prove..... it may very well be how he's going to play for the reminder of the year.   He likes playing a physical game and got to lurn to keep his stick on the ice and not in the other team players face...... he took bad penalties for high sticking and that cause the game to switch momemtum in favour of the Habs.  That Habs line Gomez, Gionta and Cammalleri is a great addition and brings another level of offense and speed. My only disapointment was Gill.... man that guy is like slow moe compared to the other players.  He caused a lot of turnovers     but hopefully he will ajust his game as the season progress.  Leechman

Hall Gill hasnt adjusted his game since he came into the league with the Bruins.  He is a pilon out there that is useless...he's slow, bad with the puck, causes turnovers, and takes bad penalties throughout his career....Im glad he's not in a Bruins uniform.  The only thing he brings to the team is the playoff expeirence of watching how his teammates can win a cup
ohh someone got BUTTHURT that the leafs lost last niiiight. and I am in therapy...

Flames and Bruins for the finals and the cup goes to ....THE FLAMES  1st game 2-1 Bruins 2nd game 1-0 Flames 3rd game 3-2 Flames 4th game 4-1 Bruins 5th game 3-2 (OT) Flames 6th game 4-2 Bruins 7th game 1-0 Flames ( OT)   Ive got balls of steel to post this cuz im not allowed to use my powers for gambling ...but oh well ...its not like we all dont know this already...

Shut up. YOU PENCIL NECK GEEK  Go bury yer head in a snow drift. Just like a turkey would.  Both teams played well. Young and strong.  It,s going to be an interesting season forsure.  Flames? Thats a story to be told. Dont let big names fool ya.
east: toronto west: detroit  winner: toronto  GO LEAFS GO

I guess I have a soft spot for Gill. He reminds me of me when I played, not that I got anywhere near the NHL.    I can sympathize with big guys who just have to stand there and watch the little buzzers scoot hither and yon. Gill would have been a star back in the day when defencemen were expected to stay at home and clear the front of the net and most of them were less than 6' tall. Thank Heaven I played back in those days. Today my pylon imitation and blistering shot (that often made it over the goal line, but not between the pipes) wouldn't make me a hero among heroes.  JF
LIGHTEN-UP !! I guess I'm a liar. Guess I should have seen it earlier that  guy with a name like kickingfrog wouldn't be a Habs fan.

Lighten-up? I'm not the one who has attached my masculinity to the success, or lack thereof, to a particular sports team. I love sports, but I do not think for one second that I am superior to someone else solely due to the results of a game.  You are also completely wrong about the origins, or meaning, of my "handle", but that is nothing that you are not already used to.  Enjoy the season.

HAHAHA, I love hockey posts!  Leafs to come out of the East????  LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL, they will be lucky to even make the playoffs. I say they finish 9th.  This year is going to be interesting though, but this is what I think:  East Finals - Phi/Wsh West Finals - Det/Chi  Cup: Wsh/Det  Cup Winner: Det in 7  The wings will be hungry this year because of last year's finish. Sure they dont have Hossa...but he didnt even play last year did he?!?! lol
And here I was thinking of banning hockey threads!
Hey Mr. Serious, my posts were intended to be humorous, including the adaptation of your on-line name. Others saw the humour in them. Geez go fishin' or something.
If George St Pierre was on OFC i wonder if his handle would be kickingfrog....   OK.. OK... OK ...enough outta me im going fishing ..ciao

Montreal>Toronto Full pwnage

wow.  the leafs are brutes.

So nhl hockey begins tomorrow...Pretty excited!  Not sure my boys are gonna make a run this year (the sens) but I'm interested to see who's gonna shine and who's going to fizzle.  So in the name of bragging rights let's pick the stanley cup. Pick a team from the east, a team from the west, and a winner!  GO!       My choices are as follows:  Eastern Conference Champs:  Philadelphia Flyers Western Conference Champs: Calgary Flames  and the cup winner is...  The Philadelphia Flyers!
mine are  gonna make it!!  Eastern Conference:Washington Capitals Western Conference: Chicago Blackhawks  Winner: Washington Capitals!!!  not my favs but i still think they have a shot
West: My Red Wings East: Washington Capitals  Cup: Red Wings
West: Calgary East: Boston   Cup: Calgary      go leafs!
East - Clearly not the Habs, However I do think that Toronto may have as good of defense of Boston. So its up for grabs - its the worst Div West- Calgary

whoa whoa whoa,....nobody even stated they think it will be the HABS! So why feel the need to straight say..."pfff well it sure as hell aint gonna be the habs?"... HABS will OWN leafs all year! Get ready for ass whoopings!

NAh Komisarek is with the Leafs.  But I will enjoy him kick aaasssing the Habs.  Lets face it, he was the only guy to stand up for his team and he is there no more.  I say to all leaf fans... Enjoy the grit that Kom will give to you as I'm sure you will realize why he was my favorite player for the Habs.  Might of lost that fight, but I like a guy that stand ups for his team.  Its instilled in us older guys.

Thats why the NHL is REDICULOUS !!!!!! Why have 2 teams play each other 8 TIMES !!!!!!!!! spread it around the league so we can actually see who the best teams are in the reg. season !  When you play the same team 8 times.. I dunno.... doesn't make sense to me !
Roy, I've ended alot of spirited arguements with that line!!

That series may well generate more revenue than any other up to the quarter, even semi, finals. That's reason enuf for that long a series.  JF

One safe prediction - with Joe Thornton and Dany Heatley on their team, San Jose will be unbeatable through the season and invisible in the playoffs. I say eliminated in the first round, four games straight.
as a sens fan, i can only hope this is true.

East -  Boston  West - Chicago  Cup- Blackhawks  I'm surprised nobody is picking the Pens! I guess it's the "New NHL" Anyone can win!  Detroit will always contend!! I'm a Leaf fan and it's getting close to game time so any Habs fans can KMA!!!!!!  :lol:  :lol:       GO LEAFS GO!!!!!!!!!

i`ll say Pittsburgh  takes the east this year....but never count out my Habs..those Little fellows are going to surprise some people.
